faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about the Jiva Prodi Harvest Champions

questions.question: How do I participate in the promotion?
questions.answer: To participate, you need to: 1) Register on our website, 2) Purchase Jiva Prodi products from authorized stores, 3) Enter the promotion codes from your purchases to win prizes.

questions.question: Where can I find promotion codes?
questions.answer: Promotion codes are printed on the packaging of participating Jiva Prodi products. Each code is 8 characters long.

questions.question: How do I enter my promotion code?
questions.answer: After registering, go to the 'Enter Code' section and input your 8-digit code. The system will validate your code and if valid, you'll be directed to the prize wheel.

questions.question: What prizes can I win?
questions.answer: You can win various prizes including T-shirts, caps, water bottles, and other Jiva Prodi merchandise. Some codes may also give you a chance to win major prizes.

questions.question: How do I claim my prize?
questions.answer: After winning a prize, you'll receive instructions on how to claim it. Most prizes can be collected from your nearest Jiva Prodi store.

questions.question: How long do I have to claim my prize?
questions.answer: Prizes must be claimed within 30 days of winning. After this period, the prize will be forfeited.

questions.question: Can I participate if I'm not a farmer?
questions.answer: Yes! The Jiva Prodi Harvest Champions promotion is open to everyone who purchases participating products, regardless of their profession.

questions.question: How do I redeem my prize?
questions.answer: After winning, you can redeem your prize at any participating Jiva store. Use the store finder to locate the nearest store.

questions.question: Can I use the same code multiple times?
questions.answer: No, each code can only be used once. If you try to use a code that has already been used, you will receive an error message.

questions.question: What if I don't win anything?
questions.answer: Don't worry! You can try again with a new code from another Jiva product. Better luck next time!
